channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- ThinkPad
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- ThinkPad

item.title: CVE-2023-2290|2024-08-02T06:19:14.606Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the LenovoFlashDeviceInterface SMI handler may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-4029|2024-08-02T07:17:11.608Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad
item.description: A buffer overflow has been identified in the BoardUpdateAcpiDxe driver in some Lenovo ThinkPad products which may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-4030|2024-08-02T07:17:11.606Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in BIOS for ThinkPad P14s Gen 2, P15s Gen 2, T14 Gen 2, and T15 Gen 2 that could cause the system to recover to insecure settings if the BIOS becomes corrupt.
